definition: from the start/absolutely/entirely/simply
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
erhua variant of 壓根|压根[ya4 gen1]

sentences.english: When I was pregnant, I could not have imagined breastfeeding in public.
sentences.chinese: 怀孕的时候，我压根就没想过当众哺乳的事情。

sentences.english: But false hope is worse than no hope at all.
sentences.chinese: 但是，虚假的希望比压根没有希望更糟糕。

sentences.english: Perhaps simply did Michael Diao me, I Biao to come to Sri Lanka a big stick Ning.
sentences.chinese: 你也许压根儿麦刁过我，我斯个彪来来地大棍宁。

sentences.english: The sun glared at them but they didn’t feel anything.
sentences.chinese: 太阳照耀着他们，但是大家压根就没有感觉到。

sentences.english: This conclusion lacks a solid legal foundation.
sentences.chinese: 这一结论压根缺乏实体法的基础。

sentences.english: Or wondering whether you should use sunscreen at all?
sentences.chinese: 或者怀疑压根就不该使用防晒霜？

sentences.english: As for long-term loans for new ventures, it can forget them.
sentences.chinese: 至于为新型企业提供的长期贷款，压根就别想了。

sentences.english: I didn't care. I didn't think about that.
sentences.chinese: 也不关心，我压根没考虑过这些事。

sentences.english: Ture, you don't have to pay much ---- or any ---- rent.
sentences.chinese: 诚然，子女不需支付很多或压根就不必支付房租。

sentences.english: They are not at all what we mean today by "child-friendly."
sentences.chinese: 其故事压根儿就不属于如今的“儿童读物”。

sentences.english: I don't think Michelle Kwan is false at all.
sentences.chinese: 我压根没觉得关颖珊很虚伪，但我觉得她很谨慎。

sentences.english: A mother smell speech on the spot at ChenYan said no hate.
sentences.chinese: 张妈妈闻言当场表示压根没有讨厌陈妍。

sentences.english: I'm completely mystified about what happened.
sentences.chinese: 我对所发生的事压根儿迷惑不解。

sentences.english: If I were Abramovich, I’d never have hired Ancelotti.
sentences.chinese: 如果我是阿布，我压根儿就不会雇佣安切洛蒂。

sentences.english: I know, but it's hard to fit a piano in a foxhole.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，但在这散兵营，你压根找不着钢琴来合奏。

sentences.english: Not long ago you wouldn’t mention China and supercomputing in the same breath.
sentences.chinese: 不久之前，中国和超级计算机压根风牛马不相及。

definition: erhua variant of 壓根|压根[ya4 gen1]
fundamental/basic/root/simply/absolutely (not)/(not) at all/CL:個|个[ge4]
always/at all times/never (if used in negative sentence)
variant of 答理[da1 li5]
to understand/to pay attention to/to take notice of
to care about/to take seriously/to take to heart
moreover/besides/in addition/furthermore
completely
life or death/fate/no matter what/anyway/for the life of me
to speak the truth/truth to tell/frankly
but on the contrary/but expectedly

to hope for sth/to count on/hope
